trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> that may contain a collection of child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个抽象类，实现后该类表示可以包含子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 对象集合的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup> can be a child of another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>可以是另一个子<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class, with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认属性初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> class with the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />、<see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration" /> 初始化 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The object to be added as the child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 要作为此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 的子项添加的对象。

trans-unit.source: If this object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> it will be added to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> collection; otherwise, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此对象是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />，则它将被添加到 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> 集合；否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 向此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 添加子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />。

trans-unit.source: The parameter <paramref name="child" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: 参数 <paramref name="child" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />。

trans-unit.source: The text added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: 添加到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 的文本。

trans-unit.source: Adds a text string as a child of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" />.
trans-unit.target: 将文本字符串添加为此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 的子级。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> does not accept text as a child, so this method will raise an InvalididOperationException unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>不接受文本为子级，因此此方法将引发 InvalididOperationException，除非派生的类已重写允许添加文本的行为。

trans-unit.source: Creates a type-specific clock for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: 创建此时间线的特定类型的时钟。

trans-unit.source: A clock for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: 此时间线的时钟。

trans-unit.source: If a derived class overrides this method, it should only create and return an object of a class inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生的类重写此方法，它应只能创建和返回从继承的类的对象<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of direct child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 的直接子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> objects of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 的子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup.Children%2A> 依赖项属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.TimelineGroup" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> object, using this instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用此实例初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockGroup" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的子对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 添加子对象。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到对象的文本。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的文本内容添加到对象。
